title: Singapore Zoo: Wildlife Access and Family Fun
blurb: Enjoy wildlife access with savings for the family.
description: Explore diverse wildlife from around the globe in immersive habitats. The Singapore Zoo offers engaging experiences for families, including animal encounters, feeding sessions, and educational shows. Discover fascinating creatures and learn about conservation efforts in a lush, natural environment. Perfect for a family day out, the zoo provides a memorable and educational experience for all ages. Observe animals in open enclosures, participate in interactive exhibits, and enjoy the beauty of nature. The zoo is committed to providing a safe and enjoyable environment for all visitors, with various amenities and facilities available.
datetime_display: Operating Hours: 8:30 AM to 6:00 PM daily

title: Splish Splash at Singapore Zoo KidzWorld
blurb: Explore an always-changing maze of water.
description: KidzWorldâ€™s wet play zone offers an always-changing maze of water for children to explore and enjoy. It is a part of KidzWorld, which aims to spark a sense of wonder for animals through up-close animal interactions and interactive play. Ranger Buddies are also located here, providing opportunities for interactive play and learning about animals. This area is designed to be family-friendly, offering a mix of educational and recreational activities suitable for children of various ages. The water maze provides a refreshing and engaging experience, especially on warm days, while the animal interactions foster a deeper appreciation for wildlife.
datetime_display: Operating Hours as per Singapore Zoo

title: Splish Splash at Singapore Zoo's KidzWorld
blurb: Explore an always-changing maze of water at KidzWorld.
description: KidzWorld's wet play zone offers an always-changing maze of water for kids to explore and enjoy. It's a fun and interactive area designed for children to splash and play in a safe environment. KidzWorld is also home to the Ranger Buddies, where kids can spark a sense of wonder for animals through up-close interactions and interactive play. This area is perfect for families with young children looking for a fun and educational experience at the Singapore Zoo. The water play area provides a refreshing break, while the Ranger Buddies offer opportunities to learn about and appreciate wildlife.
datetime_display: Operating hours as per Singapore Zoo
